articles.title: Ashton Kutcher resigns from anti-child abuse charity over support for rapist Danny Masterson - BBC
articles.description: The actor says his letter of support for rape convict Danny Masterson was an "error in judgement".
articles.content:
Ashton Kutcher has resigned from his anti-child sex abuse charity following outrage over a letter of support to a judge after Danny Masterson's rape conviction.
In his resignation to the charity, Th… [+1759 chars]

articles.title: Box Office: Kenneth Branagh’s ‘A Haunting in Venice’ Starts Off With $1.2M in Previews - Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: The third installment in the Agatha Christie-inspired movie series stars Kyle Allen, Camille Cottin, Michelle Yeoh, Tina Fey and Jamie Dornan alongside Branagh.
